mapper.select: select m.permission from sys_menu m join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.mid join sys_role r on rm.rid = r.id and r.status = '0' and r.is_delete = '0' join sys_role_user ru on r.id = ru.rid join sys_user u on ru.uid = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and m.status = '0' and m.is_delete = '0' and m.type !='0' and m.permission is not null

select u.id, u.cn_name, u.username, u.phone, u.email, u.age, u.sex, u.status, u.profile, u.remarks, u.avatar, u.create_time, d.name as deptName, pos.positionName from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id left join (select GROUP_CONCAT(sp.name order by sp.sort separator '、') as positionName, sup.uid FROM sys_position sp left join sys_user_position sup on sup.pid = sp.id where sup.uid = #{userId}) pos on u.id = pos.uid where u.id = #{userId} and u.is_delete = '0'

select u.id, u.cn_name, u.username, u.phone, u.email, u.age, u.sex, u.status, u.profile, u.remarks, u.avatar, d.name as dept_name, pos.name as position_name from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id=d.id left join ( select GROUP_CONCAT(sp.name order by sp.sort separator '、') as name, sup.uid uid FROM sys_position sp left join sys_user_position sup on sup.pid = sp.id group by uid ) pos on pos.uid = u.id
u.is_delete = 0
and u.id != #{params.id}
and u.cn_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cnName} ,'%')
and u.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username} ,'%')
and u.phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.phone} ,'%')
and u.dept_id like CONCAT('%',#{params.deptId} ,'%')
and u.status = #{params.status}
order by u.create_time
select id,username,cn_name from sys_user su where su.is_delete='0' and su.status = '0'
